text: Super interesting post <@U0DCXC37U>. Really glad you shared that. It sounds a bit like our semio sessions but I wonder if we could use this info to transform them a bit. Or this brainwriting idea could be a part of the next step after the initial semio sesh.
This article speaks something similar to Design Studio, which I’ve used in the past with teams. It’s a balance between individual thinking and group collaboration.
